page.title: 05WRENINGHAM
page.content: {Wreningham}radiates from its X-roads with a mix of old & new houses.It has its own 7-councillor parish council. There is a thriving First School,a well-used Village Hall & a playing field where weekly football practice is popular with Wren. & Ashwellthorpe youngsters.The Poplars holds harness- trotting on its land & also breeds hunters.Wreningham has a football team but no ground & plays in Norwich.There is livestock & a large housed turkey farm but the land is mainly arable.All {these provide employment}as do Spratts coach company & the light-industrial firm of Wells.Villagers walk 1/2mile to nearest Norwich/New Buckenham or Wymondham/Mulbarton bus services.There is no shop but milk & newspapers are delivered daily with baker,grocer,fish monger & mobile fish & chips calling weekly.The library van calls monthly.
